an6.54:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati gijjhakute pabbate.
an6.54:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma dhammiko jatibhumiyam avasiko hoti sabbaso jatibhumiyam sattasu avasesu.
an6.54:1.3: Tatra sudam ayasma dhammiko agantuke bhikkhu akkosati paribhasati vihimsati vitudati roseti vacaya.
an6.54:1.4: Te ca agantuka bhikkhu ayasmata dhammikena akkosiyamana paribhasiyamana vihesiyamana vitudiyamana rosiyamana vacaya pakkamanti, na santhanti, rincanti avasam.
an6.54:2.3: Atha ca pana agantuka bhikkhu pakkamanti, na santhanti, rincanti avasam.
an6.54:2.4: Ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo yena agantuka bhikkhu pakkamanti, na santhanti, rincanti avasan”ti?
an6.54:2.6: “ayam kho ayasma dhammiko agantuke bhikkhu akkosati paribhasati vihimsati vitudati roseti vacaya.
an6.54:2.7: Te ca agantuka bhikkhu ayasmata dhammikena akkosiyamana paribhasiyamana vihesiyamana vitudiyamana rosiyamana vacaya pakkamanti, na santhanti, rincanti avasam.
an6.54:3.1: Atha kho jatibhumaka upasaka yena ayasma dhammiko tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva ayasmantam dhammikam etadavocum:
an6.54:3.4: Atha kho ayasma dhammiko tamha avasa annam avasam agamasi.
an6.54:3.5: Tatrapi sudam ayasma dhammiko agantuke bhikkhu akkosati paribhasati vihimsati vitudati roseti vacaya.
an6.54:3.6: Te ca agantuka bhikkhu ayasmata dhammikena akkosiyamana paribhasiyamana vihesiyamana vitudiyamana rosiyamana vacaya pakkamanti, na santhanti, rincanti avasam.
an6.54:4.3: Atha ca pana agantuka bhikkhu pakkamanti, na santhanti, rincanti avasam.
an6.54:4.4: Ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo yena agantuka bhikkhu pakkamanti, na santhanti, rincanti avasan”ti?
an6.54:4.6: “ayam kho ayasma dhammiko agantuke bhikkhu akkosati paribhasati vihimsati vitudati roseti vacaya.
an6.54:4.7: Te ca agantuka bhikkhu ayasmata dhammikena akkosiyamana paribhasiyamana vihesiyamana vitudiyamana rosiyamana vacaya pakkamanti, na santhanti, rincanti avasam.
an6.54:5.1: Atha kho jatibhumaka upasaka yenayasma dhammiko tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva ayasmantam dhammikam etadavocum:
an6.54:5.4: Atha kho ayasma dhammiko tamhapi avasa annam avasam agamasi.
an6.54:5.5: Tatrapi sudam ayasma dhammiko agantuke bhikkhu akkosati paribhasati vihimsati vitudati roseti vacaya.
an6.54:5.6: Te ca agantuka bhikkhu ayasmata dhammikena akkosiyamana paribhasiyamana vihesiyamana vitudiyamana rosiyamana vacaya pakkamanti, na santhanti, rincanti avasam.
an6.54:6.3: Atha ca pana agantuka bhikkhu pakkamanti, na santhanti, rincanti avasam.
an6.54:6.4: Ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo yena agantuka bhikkhu pakkamanti, na santhanti, rincanti avasan”ti?
an6.54:6.5: Atha kho jatibhumakanam upasakanam etadahosi: “ayam kho ayasma dhammiko agantuke bhikkhu akkosati …pe….
an6.54:6.6: Yannuna mayam ayasmantam dhammikam pabbajeyyama sabbaso jatibhumiyam sattahi avasehi”ti.
an6.54:6.7: Atha kho jatibhumaka upasaka yenayasma dhammiko tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva ayasmantam dhammikam etadavocum:
an6.54:6.8: “pakkamatu, bhante, ayasma dhammiko sabbaso jatibhumiyam sattahi avasehi”ti.
an6.54:6.10: “pabbajito khomhi jatibhumakehi upasakehi sabbaso jatibhumiyam sattahi avasehi.
an6.54:7.1: Atha kho ayasma dhammiko pattacivaramadaya yena rajagaham tena pakkami.
an6.54:7.2: Anupubbena yena rajagaham gijjhakuto pabbato yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam dhammikam bhagava etadavoca:
an6.54:7.3: “handa kuto nu tvam, brahmana dhammika, agacchasi”ti?
an6.54:7.4: “Pabbajito aham, bhante, jatibhumakehi upasakehi sabbaso jatibhumiyam sattahi avasehi”ti.
an6.54:7.5: “Alam, brahmana dhammika, kim te imina, yam tam tato tato pabbajenti, so tvam tato tato pabbajito mameva santike agacchasi.
an6.54:8.1: Bhutapubbam, brahmana dhammika, samuddika vanija tiradassim sakunam gahetva navaya samuddam ajjhogahanti.
an6.54:8.2: Te atiradakkhiniya navaya tiradassim sakunam muncanti.
an6.54:8.3: So gacchateva puratthimam disam, gacchati pacchimam disam, gacchati uttaram disam, gacchati dakkhinam disam, gacchati uddham, gacchati anudisam.
an6.54:8.4: Sace so samanta tiram passati, tathagatakova hoti.
an6.54:8.5: Sace pana so samanta tiram na passati tameva navam paccagacchati.
an6.54:8.6: Evamevam kho, brahmana dhammika, yam tam tato tato pabbajenti so tvam tato tato pabbajito mameva santike agacchasi.
an6.54:9.1: Bhutapubbam, brahmana dhammika, ranno korabyassa suppatittho nama nigrodharaja ahosi pancasakho sitacchayo manoramo.
an6.54:9.2: Suppatitthassa kho pana, brahmana dhammika, nigrodharajassa dvadasayojanani abhiniveso ahosi, panca yojanani mulasantanakanam.
an6.54:9.3: Suppatitthassa kho pana, brahmana dhammika, nigrodharajassa tava mahantani phalani ahesum;
an6.54:9.7: Suppatitthassa kho pana, brahmana dhammika, nigrodharajassa ekam khandham raja paribhunjati saddhim itthagarena, ekam khandham balakayo paribhunjati, ekam khandham negamajanapada paribhunjanti, ekam khandham samanabrahmana paribhunjanti, ekam khandham miga paribhunjanti.
an6.54:9.8: Suppatitthassa kho pana, brahmana dhammika, nigrodharajassa na koci phalani rakkhati, na ca sudam annamannassa phalani himsanti.
an6.54:10.1: Atha kho, brahmana dhammika, annataro puriso suppatitthassa nigrodharajassa yavadattham phalani bhakkhitva sakham bhanjitva pakkami.
an6.54:10.2: Atha kho, brahmana dhammika, suppatitthe nigrodharaje adhivatthaya devataya etadahosi:
an6.54:10.4: Yava papo manusso, yatra hi nama suppatitthassa nigrodharajassa yavadattham phalani bhakkhitva sakham bhanjitva pakkamissati, yannuna suppatittho nigrodharaja ayatim phalam na dadeyya’ti.
an6.54:10.5: Atha kho, brahmana dhammika, suppatittho nigrodharaja ayatim phalam na adasi.
an6.54:11.1: Atha kho, brahmana dhammika, raja korabyo yena sakko devanamindo tenupasankami; upasankamitva sakkam devanamindam etadavoca:
an6.54:11.2: ‘yagghe, marisa, janeyyasi suppatittho nigrodharaja phalam na deti’ti.
an6.54:11.3: Atha kho, brahmana dhammika, sakko devanamindo tatharupam iddhabhisankharam abhisankhasi, yatha bhusa vatavutthi agantva suppatittham nigrodharajam pavattesi ummulamakasi.
an6.54:11.4: Atha kho, brahmana dhammika, suppatitthe nigrodharaje adhivattha devata dukkhi dummana assumukhi rudamana ekamantam atthasi.
an6.54:12.1: Atha kho, brahmana dhammika, sakko devanamindo yena suppatitthe nigrodharaje adhivattha devata tenupasankami; upasankamitva suppatitthe nigrodharaje adhivattham devatam etadavoca:
an6.54:12.2: ‘kim nu tvam, devate, dukkhi dummana assumukhi rudamana ekamantam thita’ti?
an6.54:12.3: ‘Tatha hi pana me, marisa, bhusa vatavutthi agantva bhavanam pavattesi ummulamakasi’ti.
an6.54:12.4: ‘Api nu tvam, devate, rukkhadhamme thitaya bhusa vatavutthi agantva bhavanam pavattesi ummulamakasi’ti?
an6.54:12.5: ‘Katham pana, marisa, rukkho rukkhadhamme thito hoti’ti?
an6.54:12.6: ‘Idha, devate, rukkhassa mulam mulatthika haranti, tacam tacatthika haranti, pattam pattatthika haranti, puppham pupphatthika haranti, phalam phalatthika haranti.
an6.54:12.7: Na ca tena devataya anattamanata va anabhinandi va karaniya.
an6.54:12.8: Evam kho, devate, rukkho rukkhadhamme thito hoti’ti.
an6.54:12.9: ‘Atthitayeva kho me, marisa, rukkhadhamme bhusa vatavutthi agantva bhavanam pavattesi ummulamakasi’ti.
an6.54:12.10: ‘Sace kho tvam, devate, rukkhadhamme tittheyyasi, siya te bhavanam yathapure’ti.
an6.54:12.11: ‘Thassamaham, marisa, rukkhadhamme, hotu me bhavanam yathapure’ti.
an6.54:13.1: Atha kho, brahmana dhammika, sakko devanamindo tatharupam iddhabhisankharam abhisankhasi, yatha bhusa vatavutthi agantva suppatittham nigrodharajam ussapesi, sacchavini mulani ahesum.
an6.54:13.2: Evamevam kho, brahmana dhammika, api nu tam samanadhamme thitam jatibhumaka upasaka pabbajesum sabbaso jatibhumiyam sattahi avasehi”ti?
an6.54:13.3: “Katham pana, bhante, samano samanadhamme thito hoti”ti?
an6.54:13.4: “Idha, brahmana dhammika, samano akkosantam na paccakkosati, rosantam na patirosati, bhandantam na patibhandati.
an6.54:13.5: Evam kho, brahmana dhammika, samano samanadhamme thito hoti”ti.
an6.54:13.6: “Atthitamyeva mam, bhante, samanadhamme jatibhumaka upasaka pabbajesum sabbaso jatibhumiyam sattahi avasehi”ti.
an6.54:13.7: “Bhutapubbam, brahmana dhammika, sunetto nama sattha ahosi titthakaro kamesu vitarago.
an6.54:13.8: Sunettassa kho pana, brahmana dhammika, satthuno anekani savakasatani ahesum.
an6.54:13.9: Sunetto sattha savakanam brahmalokasahabyataya dhammam desesi.
an6.54:13.10: Ye kho pana, brahmana dhammika, sunettassa satthuno brahmalokasahabyataya dhammam desentassa cittani na pasadesum te kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjimsu.
an6.54:13.11: Ye kho pana, brahmana dhammika, sunettassa satthuno brahmalokasahabyataya dhammam desentassa cittani pasadesum te kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjimsu.
an6.54:14.1: Bhutapubbam, brahmana dhammika, mugapakkho nama sattha ahosi …pe…
an6.54:18.1: … Jotipalo nama sattha ahosi titthakaro kamesu vitarago.
an6.54:18.2: Jotipalassa kho pana, brahmana dhammika, satthuno anekani savakasatani ahesum.
an6.54:18.3: Jotipalo sattha savakanam brahmalokasahabyataya dhammam desesi.
an6.54:18.4: Ye kho pana, brahmana dhammika, jotipalassa satthuno brahmalokasahabyataya dhammam desentassa cittani na pasadesum te kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjimsu.
an6.54:18.5: Ye kho pana, brahmana dhammika, jotipalassa satthuno brahmalokasahabyataya dhammam desentassa cittani pasadesum te kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjimsu.
an6.54:19.2: yo ime cha satthare titthakare kamesu vitarage, anekasataparivare sasavakasanghe padutthacitto akkoseyya paribhaseyya, bahum so apunnam pasaveyya”ti?
an6.54:19.4: “Yo kho, brahmana dhammika, ime cha satthare titthakare kamesu vitarage anekasataparivare sasavakasanghe padutthacitto akkoseyya paribhaseyya, bahum so apunnam pasaveyya.
an6.54:19.5: Yo ekam ditthisampannam puggalam padutthacitto akkosati paribhasati, ayam tato bahutaram apunnam pasavati.
an6.54:19.7: Naham, brahmana dhammika, ito bahiddha evarupim khantim vadami, yathamam sabrahmacarisu.
